attributes.description: Styles specific to coats and jackets. Examples include Anorak, Bomber, Cape, Denim, Duster, Open Front, Pullover, Quilted, Suit, Tuxedo, Convertible, and Smoking.
Length term descriptive of jackets and coats. Examples include Cropped, Long, Mid-Length, and Short.
The closure style of a suit jacket or coat. Examples include Double-Breasted and Single-Breasted.

graph.linkage_cypher: CREATE (n1:Apparel_Category {name: 'Jackets & Coats'})-[:HAS_PRODUCT_TYPE]->(n2:Product_Type {name: 'Additional Attributes'})-[:FOLLOWS_GUIDELINE]->(n3:Guideline_Type {name: 'Attributes'})-[:HAS_REQUIREMENT]->(n4:Attributes {name: 'Jacket Style, Jacket Length, Suit Breasting Style'})
